name: RRCube
description:
RRCube - The (Almost) Real Rubik's Cube

This uses the Kociemba-Solver to solve the Cube!

You can shuffle and the Computer will solve,

Or the Computer can shuffle and you can solve!

Instructions:

Right click and drag the cube. You only have to drag it a bit and release to snap!

Left click on a FACE Pull to rotate clockwise, Push to rotate Counter clockwise.

Credits:

Thanks for Megalomatt for his video on this project!
